delete [select id from Account where name like 'RULESUI Account%'];
//if required delete contacts from contact object where name like RULESUI

//Create Accounts
List<Account> accList = new List<Account>();
for(integer i=1; i<10 ; i++) {
   Account acc = new Account(Name ='RULESUI Account ' +i,Data_ExternalID__c='RULESUI Account ' +i);
   accList.add(acc);
}

insert accList;

delete [select id from JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c where JBCXM__CustomerName__c  like 'RULESUI Account%'];
//Add Accounts to Customers
List<JBCXM__PickList__c> pkList = [SELECT id FROM JBCXM__PickList__c WHERE JBCXM__Category__c = 'Customer Status' AND
                                 JBCXM__SystemName__c = 'ActiveCustomer'];
List<JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c> custList = new List<JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c>();
JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c cust = null;
Integer i = 1;
for(Account acc : [SELECT id FROM Account where name like 'RULESUI Account%']) {
            cust = new JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c(JBCXM__Account__c  = acc.id, JBCXM__Status__c  = (pkList.get(0)).id, JBCXM__MRR__c =i*10);
			custList.add(cust);
            i++;
}

insert custList;
